programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 58
programme.desc: Caroline asks Ridge who he slept with before the wedding. Ridge doesn’t want to say.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 59
programme.desc: Brooke and Storm prepare for their graduation ceremonies. Donna tells Katie she doesn’t want to go to college.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 60
programme.desc: Storm asks Alex to dinner. She decides to cancel her plans with Thorne. Eric finally realizes who Beth is.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 61
programme.desc: Caroline recognizes Brooke and suggests they get together sometime. Eric approaches Beth and they speak.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 62
programme.desc: Donna tells Katie she feels trapped at home. Brooke tells Beth she finds Ridge fascinating.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 63
programme.desc: Donna tells Katie about her plan to move out. Rocco tells Katie to tell the family for Donna’s sake.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 64
programme.desc: Thorne accuses Stephanie of favoring Ridge. Donna tells her family she is moving out.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 65
programme.desc: Caroline calls Brooke and they agree to meet. Ridge is upset to learn Alex interviews both Thorne and Eric.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 66
programme.desc: Stephanie asks Caroline to set Kristen up with eligible men. Ridge is upset that Thorne went behind his back.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 67
programme.desc: Bill wants Thorne to take over if he marries Caroline. Brooke and Caroline get to know each other.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 68
programme.desc: Rocco defends Katie against bullies and gives her a big kiss. Kristen asks Eric about his college sweetheart.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 69
programme.desc: Rocco tells Donna to dump Mark and move home. Stephanie is suspicious when Eric leaves for his date with Beth.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 70
programme.desc: Eric tells Beth he left her because Stephanie got pregnant. Brooke is happy to play tennis at the Forrester's.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 71
programme.desc: Thorne is uncomfortable about being set up with Brooke. Stephanie suspects Eric is being unfaithful.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 72
programme.desc: Eric tells Margo about his meeting with Beth. Brooke invites Caroline over the same night Storm invites Alex.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 73
programme.desc: Ridge is shocked to hear Thorne has been offered another job. Bill comforts Margo about Eric.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 74
programme.desc: Brooke tries to set Storm up with Caroline but Storm says he is with Alex. Katie and Rocco go to visit Donna.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 75
programme.desc: Storm decides to call Caroline. Storm thanks Rocco for helping Katie. Ridge tells Caroline about his concerns.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 76
programme.desc: Thorne and Kristen try to find out who Eric is seeing. Kristen is surprised her parents' marriage has lasted.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 77
programme.desc: Donna is fired, she and Mark get into a fight. Margo tells Ridge Eric is involved with someone from college.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 78
programme.desc: Ridge asks Thorne about his job offer. Beth tells Stephanie someone else will supervise Eric’s party.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 79
programme.desc: Donna is thankful when Rocco gets her a job. Beth won’t see Eric anymore because Stephanie loves him.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 80
programme.desc: Mark is angry to learn Donna will be working with Rocco. Rocco rescues Ridge and Caroline from a mugging.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 81
programme.desc: Eric asks Stephanie to cancel the birthday party. Caroline decides to set Kristen up with her boss.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 82
programme.desc: Bill meets Alex and finds out where she is staying. Caroline tells Stephanie about Ridge pressuring her.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 83
programme.desc: Ridge tries to seduce Margo. Donna apologizes to Rocco. Kristen enjoys her blind date with Chuck.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 84
programme.desc: Katie thanks Rocco for helping her skin clear up. Ridge tries to seduce Brooke and invites her to swim.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 85
programme.desc: Bill meets with Alex and shows her the picture of her with Ridge.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 86
programme.desc: Eric asks Thorne the details of his job offer. Bill talks Alex into a plan to humiliate Ridge.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 87
programme.desc: Eric asks Ridge to help him find a way to make Thorne stay. Storm and Mark argue about Donna working too much.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 88
programme.desc: Mark and Donna decide to go out but Donna falls asleep before they leave. Brooke and Caroline go see Ridge.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 89
programme.desc: Mark tells Donna he was an unwanted child. Brooke tells Caroline the truth about what happened.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 90
programme.desc: Katie tells Beth she might love Rocco. Ron sees Caroline at a restaurant and wants to get to know her.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 91
programme.desc: Ron walks Caroline home and tells her he has a knife and will hurt her if she doesn’t comply.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 92
programme.desc: Caroline is shaken by her rape. She calls Brooke for help. Ridge receives Caroline’s letter.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 93
programme.desc: Rocco tries to play footsie with Donna at dinner but mistakes Grandma Logan’s leg for Donna’s.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 94
programme.desc: Dave arrives and wants to call a rape investigation unit for Caroline but Brooke is reluctant.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 95
programme.desc: Charles calls for Kristen and they agree to meet. Stephanie tells Ridge about the health risks of casual sex.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 96
programme.desc: Thorne tells Eric he intends to pursue Caroline. Kristen and Chuck have fun playing tennis.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 97
programme.desc: Donna asks Rocco to work the late shift but Rocco just gives her the money. Brooke brings Caroline home.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 98
programme.desc: Thorne visits Caroline to offer his support. Brooke convinces Caroline to go to the Rape Response Center.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 99
programme.desc: Stephanie realizes Bill offered Thorne a job. Caroline gets help at the Rape Response Center.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 100
programme.desc: Ridge shows his concern for Thorne’s unhappy behavior. Stephanie is upset to see the article about Ridge.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 101
programme.desc: Dave and Brooke offer Caroline counsel for the rape attempt. Mark thanks Beth for loaning them money.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 102
programme.desc: Mark has an angry confrontation with Donna and Rocco over the rent money and Katie is heartbroken.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 103
programme.desc: Margo is surprised that Bill offered Thorne a job. Stephanie is furious with Bill's attempt to steal Thorne.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 104
programme.desc: Bill confronts Thorne over Caroline's disappearance. Storm comforts Caroline. Margo berates Ridge.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 105
programme.desc: Bill is devastated by the news of Caroline's rape. Caroline receives counseling at the rape response center.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 106
programme.desc: Thorne continues to comfort Caroline. Ridge is in the dark about Caroline's tragedy and Thorne's job offer.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 107
programme.desc: Donna tries to convince Katie that Rocco's kiss was meaningless. Rocco is crushed with Donna's rejection.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 108
programme.desc: Ridge confronts Thorne over his job offer and Caroline. Caroline works with a police sketch artist.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 109
programme.desc: Brooke tells Thorne about the police's insensitive treatment of Caroline and Thorne is livid.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 110
programme.desc: Beth tells Eric it's impossible for them to pick up where they left off. Bill hires a P.I. to find the rapist.

programme.title: The Bold And The Beautiful
programme.sub-title: The Bold And The Beautiful: Episode 111
programme.desc: Dave reassures Caroline that the entire police force is behind the investigation. Donna misses Rocco.
